title: DaffProgressIndicatorComponent
contents:
DaffProgressIndicatorComponent

Selector: 'daff-progress-indicator'

Properties

Name
Type
Description
@Input() color
DaffPalette
The color of the progress indicator See DaffColorable
@Input() percentage
number
The percentage completion of the progression, expressed as a whole number between 0 and 100.
@Output() finished
EventEmitter<void>
An event that emits each time the progression reaches 100% and the animation is finished
onAnimationComplete
void
Calculates when the progress animation is fully completed
